alert.note: Alert for Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 12:15PM EDT until further notice by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Florida, including the following county, Duval. * WHEN...Until 315 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1213 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain has occurred. Flooding is already occurring along McCoys Creek, and additional flooding for McCoys and Hogan`s Creeks remains possible. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jacksonville and Riverside. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
